scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf main/node_modules && rm -rf bet-it/node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build: yarn install --ignore-engines && npm run install && rm -rf build && mkdir build && npm-run-all --serial build:*
scripts.build:demo: mkdir -p build/sub-app-demo  && cd sub-app-demo && npm run build && mv ./build/* ../build/sub-app-demo
scripts.build:bet-it: mkdir -p build/bet-it  && cd bet-it && npm run build && mv ./build/* ../build/bet-it
scripts.build:main: cd main && npm run build && mv ./build/* ../build/ && cp ../public/favicon.ico ../build/
